review_data.title: Innovative Küche, angenehme Atmosphäre, freundliche Bedienung
review_data.content: - sehr gute, originelle Cocktails - viele Möglichkeiten auch glutenfrei / vegan - sehr freundliche Bedienung - grosse Auswahl mit...More

review_data.title: A taste of around the world
review_data.content: Really enjoy the round the world concept which allows you to experience different types of cuisines. Particularly loved the espanadas. Highly recommend it and great cocktails too.

review_data.title: A delicious meal & great cocktails
review_data.content: We had a lovely meal followed by a selection of cocktails. Our main meal was delicious, its so nice finding a restaurant the serves food so different from the usual. A friend recommended the Crepe Suzette and it did not disappoint!!

review_data.title: Viel Lärm um nichts
review_data.content: Sehr teuer für was man kriegt! Da geh ich nicht mehr hin. Personal sehr freundlich! Wir haben das Lokal hungrig...More
